org.spongepowered.api.entity.explosive

Interface Explosive

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataHolder, DataSerializable, Entity, Identifiable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Creeper, ExplosiveProjectile, Fireball, Firework, FusedExplosive, IgnitableExplosive, LargeFireball, MinecartTNT, PrimedTNT, SmallFireball, WitherSkull

    public interface Explosive
extends Entity
    Represents an explosive entity that explodes.

    • Method Summary

      Detonates this explosive immediately.
